comments:
Description:
Exception when copy parameter group name and paste it as parameter name
Build number:2.2.1.v20070723

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a parameter group, copy its name.
2. New a report parameter inside the parameter group, paste group name as parameter name.

Expected result:
Group name is pasted as parameter name.

Actual result:
Group name is pasted as parameter name but throws out ClassCastException.

Error log:
